short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select and right click to correct the text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right me is a smart text corrector in a simple extension to correct any text in multiple languages. 
Rephrase your sentence in one click for a cleaner finish. 
Using Google AI for now, more AI platforms to come. 
Get started by entering your API Key, generate it for free by simply clicking on settings then on get an API key.
